about_the_game:
From the creators of Search & Find - Hidden Objects, Where’s Fido is a relaxing 3D hidden objects journey, where you will be searching and finding lost dogs. With the support from Officer Kay Nine, you embark on search missions all around the world to find missing pups. Unlock exciting new worlds from the big city to the Wild West as you seek and find different dogs from Dalmatians to the Golden Retrievers. Maybe the dogs are hiding on the Pirate ship or could they have wandered down to the farm? Hop on a tractor and see if you can spot them!
Take a closer look and discover all the wonderful details in the fun, animated 3D worlds. Is that a doggie in the window? Zoom in with the magnifying glass and find out! There are loads of levels to explore and with the sticker book to fill, you will have even more hidden objects to find! Join in on the search party fun and help bring the adorable furry friends home.

Features
- Fun and colorful 3D low-poly graphics in lively animated worlds, perfect for animal lovers, fans of hidden object games and anyone looking for a new immersive puzzle adventure.
- Discover exciting new levels and pups from different parts of the world. Can you spot the Shiba behind the cherry tree or bring home the Dobermann amongst the pirates?
- Unlock hidden levels, that deliver fun new gameplay experiences - there’s a train arriving on the platform, why not hop on board!
- Collect sticker sets.
- Simple, intuitive and familiar hidden objects controls to help you navigate the buzzing 3D world with ease.
- Use a magnifying glass to take a closer look for an extra clue of the hiding pup.

Download Where’s Fido for a relaxing hidden objects journey around the world today!

name: Where's Fido?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: From the creators of Search & Find - Hidden Objects, Where’s Fido is a relaxing 3D hidden objects journey, where you will be searching and finding lost dogs all around the world.
